summary: Build an all-in-one global e-commerce website where users can browse and buy products from around the world with online ordering and delivery through a single site.

existing_features.title: Create a customer-facing e-commerce web app that lets users browse a global product catalog from a single site, including: home page, category listing, search, product detail pages, and the ability to add/remove items to a cart.
Implement a basic checkout flow to place an order for delivery, collecting a delivery address and contact details, and creating an order record that can be viewed later.
Add Internet Identity login and associate orders with the authenticated principal so each user only sees their own order history.

Create an admin-only section (restricted to a configurable allowlist of principals in the backend) to manage the product catalog: create/update/delete products, set price, stock, category, and images.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the entire frontend (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a modern marketplace; keep all user-facing UI text in English.
Generate and include seed data so the storefront is usable immediately after deploy (sample categories and at least 20 products spanning multiple categories, with images).

Rename the website brand to "Kaninwals E Commerce" across the storefront UI and browser metadata, replacing the existing "GlobalMart" branding wherever it is user-visible (e.g., header brand text, footer headings, and the HTML document <title>).

new_feature_requests.summary: All-in-one global e-commerce website for worldwide products with online ordering and delivery
Add product and order persistence in the Motoko backend (single actor), including stable storage for products, carts (if stored server-side), and orders.
Rename the website to "Kaninwals E Commerce" and provide a complete set-up/deployed website deliverable
